8: All the Boys Are Called Patrick

--------------------
Text: Les Mistons:  It has been stated that the formation of the French New Wave could be "tracked through two short films": Jean-Luc Godard's "All the Boys Are Called Patrick" and Truffaut's "Les Mistons".
